quotes.quote: Skate for fun, not for fame.
Skateboarding is a poetry of motion.
If you skateboard, you cant be afraid to have people laugh at you.
We're skateboarders, and nothing big or small can stop us. Except pebbles. Pebbles are like kryptonite to us.
All skateboarding is, is putting ideas into action.
Think about how much skateboarding opens your eyes to see the world differently.
If skateboarding ever gets too scary for you, then you were never meant to skate in the first place.
You can't be careful on a skateboard.
Life is a lot like skateboarding.
In skateboarding, you're never bigger than the streets.
Just skate for fun, don't pick up a skateboard because you want to be a pro one day. Don't forget why you started skating in the first place.
When in doubt, skate it out.
You didn't quit skateboarding because you got old, you got old because you quit skateboarding.
One thing about a skater, they never quit, so a skater to sum it up is awesome.
Skateboarding doesn't make you a skateboarder.  Not being able to stop skateboarding make you a skateboarder.
Skateboarding is a way to let your body control the mind.
